name: Sure Petcare Device Status
author: HerzScheisse
description: Display the Sure Petcare Device status for either Hub, Flap or Feeder.

settings.label: Device Number
settings.description: the last digit of your device item in your .items file ( 1 - for the first device, 2 - for the second device, etc.)

settings.label: Device Type
settings.description: Choose which kind of device you want to add.

settings.label: Background Icon
settings.description: This is the Background Icon. f.e. you could use "Builtin: Smart Home Set" and then choose "pet"
